sections.name: Venexus's Wyrmlings
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Rare
traits.text: This rarity indicates that a rules element is very difficult to find in the game world. A rare feat, spell, item or the like is available to players only if the GM decides to include it in the game, typically through discovery during play. Creatures with this trait are rare. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creatures is increased by 5.

traits.name: Chaotic
traits.text: Chaotic effects often manipulate energy from chaos-aligned Outer Planes and are anathema to lawful divine servants or divine servants of lawful deities. A creature with this trait is chaotic in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Medium
traits.text: *Space:* 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 5 feet, *Reach (Long):* 5 feet

traits.name: Cold
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.

traits.name: Dragon
traits.text: Dragons are reptilian creatures, often winged or with the power of flight. Most are able to use a breath weapon and are immune to sleep and paralysis.

interaction_abilities.name: Snow Vision
interaction_abilities.text: Snow doesn't impair a white dragon's vision; the wyrmling ignores concealment from snowfall.

automatic_abilities.name: Frightful Presence
automatic_abilities.text: aura, emotion, fear, mental) 90 feet, DC 19

universal_monster_ability.name: Frightful Presence
universal_monster_ability.text: A creature that first enters the area must attempt a Will save. Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to this monster's Frightful Presence for 1 minute.

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature’s emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Fear
traits.text: Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target’s mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

universal_monster_ability.critical_success: The creature is unaffected by the presence.

reactive_abilities.name: Freezing Blood
reactive_abilities.trigger: An adjacent creature deals piercing or slashing damage to the wyrmling
reactive_abilities.effect: The wyrmling's blood splatters onto the triggering creature, dealing 1d4 cold damage. A creature that takes cold damage in this way is slowed 1 for 1 round.

traits.name: Arcane
traits.text: This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Cold
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.

traits.name: Cold
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

ability.name: Ice Climb
ability.text: A white dragon can climb on ice as though they had the listed climb Speed. They ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and don't risk falling when crossing ice.

ability.name: Breath Weapon

traits.name: Arcane
traits.text: This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Cold
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

ability.text: The wyrmling breathes a cloud of frost that deals 6d6 cold damage in a 30-foot cone (DC 22 basic Reflex save). They can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

ability.name: Draconic Frenzy
ability.text: The wyrmling makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.

ability.name: Draconic Momentum
ability.text: When the wyrmling scores a critical hit with a Strike, they recharge their Breath Weapon.
